color-block elegance for all sizes video tutorial https //youtu be/qwldbwm7ffw this pattern is included in the just two seams collection https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/just-two-seams-crochet-collection 1 this pattern combines texture style and versatility to create a long cardigan that s as fashionable as it is comfortable **features ** **color-block design ** the robin duster cardigan showcases a captivating color-blocked design using three different yarn colors to create a visually striking garment that stands out in any crowd **textured stitch ** crafted with a textured alpine stitch this cardigan boasts depth and dimension adding an extra layer of interest to your creation **modular construction ** the body of the cardigan is created flat with the sleeves added flat on each side two simple seams shape it into a duster cardigan creating a seamless and polished finish **ribbing detail ** complete your cardigan with ribbing around the neckline and sleeves providing structure and shaping for a comfortable fit **size-inclusive ** this pattern is size-inclusive ranging from xs to 5x ensuring that everyone can create their own custom-fit duster cardigan **video tutorial ** need additional guidance access our comprehensive video tutorial providing step-by-step instructions and visual demonstrations to support your crafting journey **guided diagrams chart and schematic ** each section of the pattern is accompanied by detailed diagrams a chart and a schematic offering clarity and precision throughout the construction process create your own robin crochet duster cardigan and make a bold statement with your handmade fashion **size range xs to 5x** **materials needed ** yarn wecrochet upcycle alpaca blend 2 or heatherly worsted 3 2375 2425 2500 2575 2650 2750 2825 2900 3000 yards crochet hook 4 4mm tapestry needle 5 stitch markers 6 scissors 7 **level intermediate** **pattern includes** written instructions guided diagrams chart schematic video tutorial cheers -
